page.description: Ensures a directory structure exists within the specified rootpath. If the directories do not exist, they are created.

argument.name: rootpath
argument.description: The file URL of the existing directory that will contain the directories that are needed.

argument.name: dirStructure
argument.description: The path of directories to ensure exists below the *[js:rootpath]*. The directories will be created if they do not exist.

argument.name: onSuccess
argument.description: A javascript function that is called when the directory structure is verified to exist.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if an error occurs when trying to verify and/or create the specified directory structure.
